::Iron Raptor::

Iron Raptor's eyes narrow at the mention of letting Predacons use the 
CR chambers.

"There will be no Predacons inside the CF, or any other Maximal 
base," she says forcefully. "If you want a cease-fire, fine. Anything 
else, and you may leave now."

She could sence Prowl's approval for declining the shared usage of 
facilities, but also sensed that he didn't think that her second 
comment was very curteous. But that didn't matter. She was leader 
here, and curteous or not, she wasn't going to let Predacons rampage 
through the Cybertronian Fire.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton senses that he struck the right cord with his offer but 
still keeps
> a poker face. "Obviously both of uor teams are in great danger if 
attacked,
> All I'm suggesting now is that you watch our backs, and we watch 
yours. If
> you get attacked we'll come to your aid and if we're attacked you 
assist
> us." The offer sounded innocent enough but he knew that they sensed 
a
> loophole. " The only other catch is that we give each other access 
to the CR
> chambers wherever the battle takes place." Megaton had just thrown 
in the
> old catch 22, if a maximal was injured at the predacon base 
they'dtreat him
> there, but it would also involve the possability of letting a 
predacon
> inside the CF.
